input_args.passage: 'Wim Jonk | Wilhelmus Maria "Wim" Jonk is a Dutch professional football manager and former player, who is the current technical manager of Eredivisie club FC Volendam.'
input_args.claim: 'In citation, it states that "Jonk and Jordi Cruyff co-manage and lead the Amsterdam-based international football institute Cruyff Football".'
